stories.fantasy_headline: Wizards Discover Dream-Weaving Spells for Brilliant New Ideas!
stories.fantasy_story: The Dream-Weavers' Guild has unveiled a wondrous new magic! They can now subtly enchant sleepers' dreams with whispers and charms, guiding their thoughts. This allows folk to awaken with fresh, creative ideas and clever solutions to their daily quandaries.
